name: Death Dog
description: A two-headed, monstrous canine with matted fur and glowing, bloodshot eyes, known for its ferocity and aggressive nature.
memorable: The Death Dog's ability to inflict a deadly disease with its bite and its relentless nature as a hunter make it a terrifying foe.
goals: To guard tombs and ruins, and to hunt and attack travelers.
relations: Often found in the company of dark masters or other aggressive creatures.
environment: Typically found in plains and deserts.
strengths: Two heads grant advantage on Perception checks and saving throws against various conditions; highly aggressive and territorial.
weaknesses: Average armor class and relatively low intelligence, making tactical planning difficult.
attacks: The Death Dog can make two bite attacks with its powerful jaws, capable of inflicting disease.
most_powerful_ability: The 'Dual Bark' ability can deafens foes within range, creating chaos in encounters.
senses: Possesses a passive Perception of 15, indicating keen awareness of surroundings.
skills: Has proficiency in Stealth, indicating it can move quietly and ambush prey effectively.
additional_information: Saliva carries a foul disease that can rot flesh over time.
Infectious bite that can poison and drain hit points.
Cannot be flanked due to its two-headed nature.
Aggressive territorial behavior makes it dangerous to intruders.

death dog that inflicts deadly disease
menacing dog that deafens its foes
